item.title: ICPC Singapore 2015 Regional 模擬賽心得
item.description: 題目 NAME A Association for Cool Machineries (Part 1) B Association for Cool Machineries (Part 2) C Association for Control Over Minds D Association of Computer Maintenance E Association for Computing Machinery F Air Conditioned Minions G Association for the Country of Mububa H Association for Convex Main Office I Apples, Cherries, and Mangos J Association of Camera Makers K Association of Cats and Magical Lights 心得 這次首先感謝原齊神之思路，以及子權的 $ O(n) $ 算法 TLE ( $2\leq n\leq 100$ )

item.title: NCPC 2020 心得文
item.description: 題目 個人備份載點 Title A Partial Fraction B The Magic Square C eBike Battery Drain D Mysterious Message E Navigation Problem F Number Combination Problem G National Challenging Proud Curiosity 心得 戰績：校內第7名，榜單上第25名，沒能晉級QQ

item.title: 2020/09/18 師大碼賽客 模擬賽心得
item.description: 題目 Origin Title A UVA 10530 Guessing Game B UVA 12428 Enemy at the Gates C UVALive 6693 Flow Game D UVALive 6692 Lucky Number E UVA 1589 Xiangqi F UVALive 7003 A Balance Game on Trees G UVA 11419 SAM I AM H UVA 11324 The Largest Clique I UVA 11825 Hackers’ Crackdown J UVA 10462 Is There A Second Way Left?
